creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text:
This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report.   

Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: 

Never. Nothing. Nobody. Feeling the void. And these empty words. Swelling. The demagoguery of today is rife with them. But each day, the time seems to gnaw at them a little, erasing the authority of absence, and reminding us that in fact, it’s Always Something for Somebody.
title: October 5, 2020: Nobody. Nothing. Never.
